            </a>
          </div>

1-.686-.45l-.045-.04-.016-.015-.006-.006-.004-.004v-.001a.75.75 0 0 1-.154-.838L2.178 4.5H1.75a.75.75 0 0 1 0-1.5h2.234a.249.249 0 0 0 .125-.033l1.288-.737c.265-.15.564-.23.869-.23h.984V.75a.75.75 0 0 1 1.5 0Zm2.945 8.477c.285.135.718.273 1.305.273s1.02-.138 1.305-.273L13 6.327Zm-10 0c.285.135.718.273 1.305.273s1.02-.138 1.305-.273L3 6.327Z"></path></svg></span><span data-component="text" data-content="MIT license" class="Box-sc-g0xbh4-0">MIT license</span></a></li></ul></nav><button style="--button-color:fg.subtle" type="button" aria-label="Outline" id=":Rr9ab:" aria-haspopup="true" tabindex="0" class="types__StyledButton-sc-ws60qy-0 jPraEl"><svg aria-hidden="true" focusable="false" role="img" class="octicon octicon-list-unordered" viewBox="0 0 16 16" width="16" height="16" fill="currentColor" style="display:inline-block;user-select:none;vertical-align:text-bottom;overflow:visible"><path d="M5.75 2.5h8.5a.75.75 0 0 1 0 1.5h-8.5a.75.75 0 0 1 0-1.5Zm0 5h8.5a.75.75 0 0 1 0 itemprop="text"><div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h1 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">Try Public APIs for free</h1><a id="user-content-try-public-apis-for-free" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: Try Public APIs for free" href="#try-public-apis-for-free"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<p dir="auto">Explore popular APIs and see them work in Postman.
<br></p>
<p dir="auto">
    <a href="https://apilayer.com" rel="nofollow">
        </a></p><div dir="auto">
            <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="/public-apis/public-apis/blob/master/.github/cs1586-APILayerLogoUpdate2022-LJ_v2-HighRes.png"><img src="/public-apis/public-apis/raw/master/.github/cs1586-APILayerLogoUpdate2022-LJ_v2-HighRes.png" width="250" alt="APILayer Logo" style="max-width: 100%;"></a>
        </div>
    
  <p dir="auto"></p>
<p dir="auto"><a href="https://apilayer.com/" rel="nofollow">APILayer</a> is the fastest way to integrate APIs into any product. They created this repository to support the community in easily finding public APIs. Explore their collections on the <a href="https://www.postman.com/apilayer/workspace/apilayer/overview" rel="nofollow">Postman API Network</a>.</p>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h3 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">APILayer APIs</h3><a id="user-content-apilayer-apis" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: APILayer APIs" href="#apilayer-apis"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>

<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h3 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">Anti-Malware</h3><a id="user-content-anti-malware" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: Anti-Malware" href="#anti-malware"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>

<td align="left"><code>apiKey</code></td>
<td align="left">Yes</td>
<td align="left">Unknown</td>

<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h3 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">Geocoding</h3><a id="user-content-geocoding" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: Geocoding" href="#geocoding"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>

  <h2 class="mb-3 h4">About</h2>

      <p class="f4 my-3">
        A collective list of free APIs
      </p>
      <div class="my-3 d-flex flex-items-center">
        <svg aria-hidden="true" height="16" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" data-view-component="true" class="octicon octicon-link flex-shrink-0 mr-2">

    <h3 class="sr-only">Topics</h3>
    <div class="my-3">
        <div class="f6">
      <a data-ga-click="Topic, repository page" data-octo-click="topic_click" data-octo-dimensions="topic:api" href="/topics/api" title="Topic: api" data-view-component="true" class="topic-tag topic-tag-link">

      <a data-ga-click="Topic, repository page" data-octo-click="topic_click" data-octo-dimensions="topic:lists" href="/topics/lists" title="Topic: lists" data-view-component="true" class="topic-tag topic-tag-link">

      <a data-ga-click="Topic, repository page" data-octo-click="topic_click" data-octo-dimensions="topic:development" href="/topics/development" title="Topic: development" data-view-component="true" class="topic-tag topic-tag-link">
  development

      <a data-ga-click="Topic, repository page" data-octo-click="topic_click" data-octo-dimensions="topic:public" href="/topics/public" title="Topic: public" data-view-component="true" class="topic-tag topic-tag-link">
  public
</a>
      <a data-ga-click="Topic, repository page" data-octo-click="topic_click" data-octo-dimensions="topic:resources" href="/topics/resources" title="Topic: resources" data-view-component="true" class="topic-tag topic-tag-link">
  resources
